title: Everybody's prejudiced
creator_credit: Donald Brittain, Peter Jones and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: Everybody? Well, there is prejudice and prejudice. From the man who refuses his breakfast egg because experience tells him to, to the man who dislikes his new neighbors for no reason at all, this film offers examples of prejudice that everyone will recognize and wish to discuss.
creator_credit_for_label: Donald Brittain, Peter Jones and National Film Board of Canada
